page.title: 16TOURISM AROUND REETH2
page.content: {Tourism continued from p.15:-} to cycle and walk.The National Park keep the footpaths open and in good repair. The Tourist Information Center is at the Folk Museum. There are a number of shops in the Reeth area that cater for the needs of tourists(see p. 10) {Accomodation and food/drink in}Reeth {Public Houses:-}The Black Bull,The Kings Arms;The Buck {Hotels:_}The Burgoyne, The Arkleside. {Cafes:-}Copper Kettle,The Barn,The Blacksmiths,The Mews Crafts. We estimate that there are about Fifteen to Twenty houses in the grid area that offer accomodation for tourists.There are also a number of cottages that are kept for holiday accommodation.
